name: HubSpot deal sync to vPlan
description:
Automatically synchronize deals from HubSpot to vPlan, creating and planning them in your vPlan environment as soon as they appear in HubSpot. This template is ideal for teams using a sales pipeline board in vPlan, ensuring that every deal is immediately visible and actionable.

The scenario is ready-to-use out of the box and can be extended to include custom fields, activities, or additional logic to match your workflow. By connecting HubSpot and vPlan, you eliminate manual data entry, streamline your sales-to-planning process, and keep your pipeline up to date in real time.
